data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Ramban, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ramban, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Ramban, Jammu and Kashmir, India to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 40 believers in Ramban to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Ramban. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kashmiri (Muslim traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Ramban, Jammu and Kashmir, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Ramban.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Ramban, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Ramban
location.people_groups_list: Sapiada, Rajput Awan, Lama, Seok, Beda
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sapiada (100), Rajput Awan (11,000), Lama (600), Seok (1,700), Beda (600)
